original_title: Vom Duft der Roten Bete und den Menschen, die ewig leben
overview: A researcher discovers the key to immortality: beet! Those who surround themselves with its scent will live forever. An impenetrable magenta atmosphere envelops the planet. Immortality spreads like a virus, death is impossible.
title: Vom Duft der Roten Bete und den Menschen, die ewig leben
